content: beautifully striped for a classic look this dynamic crochet blanket is a sweet gift for the new mom stitched from the middle using our cushy bernat baby blanket we used 2 colors to achieve the striped dots effect this delightful pattern is perfect for practicing v_stitch and shell techniques make it as designed or choose any 2 colors to match the nursery or mom s particular tastes yarns for model bernat® baby blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m main color mc blueberry confetti 04881 2 balls or 420 yds/384 m contrast a blueberry sprinkles 04870 2 balls or 405 yds/370 m
